a. 0x80000000
    = 1000 0000 .... 0000
    = -0 // denormalized value
b. 0x3FE00000
    = 0011 1111 1110 0000 ... 0000
    = 0 01111111 110 0000 ... 0000
    = (-1)^0 * 1.11 * 2^255
c. 0xC3140000
    = 1100 0011 0001 0100 0000 ... 0000
    = 1 10000110 00101000000...0000
    = (-1)^1 * 1.00101 * 2^(2^8 + 2^2 + 2^1)
    = -1 * 1.00101 * 2^(260)
